name: BirdWatch
description:
BirdWatch is a game of camouflage, paranoia, and patience. In it, you play as either a farmer or as a government drone designed to look like an ordinary bird. As a farmer, you know the government is watching you via these birds, and your objective is to discover which, among a flock of real birds, is the government spy, and then shoot it down with a can-launcher. As a bird drone, your objective is to scan the farm, looking for individual objects of alien origin, which the farmer has collected from a recent UFO crash.

Gameplay unfolds as the two teams struggle to complete their goals. If the drone bird team is destroyed, the farmer team wins; if the bird team manages to scan enough alien objects, it wins.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was developed as an assignment for the Game Development program at Algonquin College.
